named-query.name: READ_ADDRESS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Address address WHERE address.customer.id = :customerId ORDER BY address.id

named-query.name: READ_ADDRESS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID_AND_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Address address WHERE address.customer.id = :customerId AND address.addressName = :addressName

named-query.name: READ_ADDRESS_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Address address WHERE address.id = :addressId
